sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
        <input type="text" v-model="title">
        <button type="submit">Create</button>
    </form>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            title: ''
        }
    },
    methods: {
        onSubmit(){
             if(this.title.trim()){
                const newTodo = {
                    id: Date.now(),
                    title: this.title,
                    completed: false
                }
                this.$emit('add-todo',newTodo)
             }
         } 
         
    }
}

</script>
<style scoped>
    form{
        display: flex;
    }
    input {
        width: 400px;
    }
</style>
